title: Awesome List Updates on May 29, 2019

items.title: Awesome Ruby
items.content_text:

items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Npm
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Ember
items.content_text:
### Packages / Web Components

*   [shadow-dom (⭐30)](https://github.com/knownasilya/ember-shadow-dom) - Write templates for your components inside of a Shadow DOM root.

### Packages / Webpack

### Packages / Weird

*   [ember-dynamic-render-template (⭐14)](https://github.com/miguelcobain/ember-dynamic-render-template) - Render DOM from a template string.

items.title: Awesome Flutter
items.content_text:
### Top / Game Engine resources

*   [Spacex-Go (⭐902)](https://github.com/jesusrp98/spacex-go) <!--stargazers:jesusrp98/spacex-go--> - Simple yet powerful, open-source SpaceX launch tracker. [jesusrp98](https://twitter.com/jesusrp98).
*   [Superhero Interaction (⭐220)](https://github.com/pinkeshdarji/SuperHeroInteraction) <!--stargazers:pinkeshdarji/SuperHeroInteraction--> - Cool Superhero interaction animation by [Pinkesh Darji](https://github.com/pinkeshdarji)
items.content_html:

  • Spacex-Go (⭐902) - Simple yet powerful, open-source SpaceX launch tracker. jesusrp98.

items.title: Awesome Artificial Intelligence
items.content_text:
### Learning / Commerical Tools

*   [Awesome Community Detection (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-community-detection) - Clustering graph structured data
*   [Awesome Decision Tree Papers (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-decision-tree-papers) - Decision tree papers from machine learning conferences
*   [Awesome Gradient Boosting Papers (⭐1k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-gradient-boosting-papers) - Gradient boosting papers from machine learning conferences
*   [Awesome Fraud Detection Papers (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-fraud-detection-papers) - Fraud detection papers from machine learning conferences
items.content_html:
Learning / Commerical Tools

  • Awesome Community Detection (⭐2.4k) - Clustering graph structured data
  • Awesome Decision Tree Papers (⭐2.4k) - Decision tree papers from machine learning conferences
  • Awesome Gradient Boosting Papers (⭐1k) - Gradient boosting papers from machine learning conferences
  • Awesome Fraud Detection Papers (⭐1.7k) - Fraud detection papers from machine learning conferences

items.title: Awesome React Components
items.content_text:
### Notification

*   🚀 [react-toastify (⭐13k)](https://github.com/fkhadra/react-toastify) - [demo](https://fkhadra.github.io/react-toastify/) - best bet out there at the moment. Hooks support. No refs.
items.content_html:
Notification

  • 🚀 react-toastify (⭐13k) - demo - best bet out there at the moment. Hooks support. No refs.

items.title: Awesome Libgdx
items.content_text:
### Resources / Algorithms and AI

*   [gdx-ai (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/libgdx/gdx-ai) - Artificial Intelligence framework featuring Steering Behaviors, Formation Motion, Pathfinding, Behavior Trees and Finite State Machines.

### Resources / Controllers

*   [gdx-controllerutils (⭐60)](https://github.com/MrStahlfelge/gdx-controllerutils) - Adds Scene2D button input support, user configurable button mappings and hotplugging for LWJGL2.

### Resources / Services

*   [steamworks4j (⭐496)](https://github.com/code-disaster/steamworks4j) - A thin wrapper which allows Java applications to access the Steamworks C++ API.

### Resources / User Interface

*   [gdx-dialogs (⭐80)](https://github.com/TomGrill/gdx-dialogs) - Provides cross-platform support for native dialogs.
*   [InGameConsole (⭐136)](https://github.com/StrongJoshua/libGDX-inGameConsole) - Allows a developer to add a console (similar to how it is featured in Source games) to their game.

### Resources / Visual Effects

*   [Box2DLights (⭐262)](https://github.com/libgdx/box2dlights) - 2D lighting framework that uses Box2D for raycasting and OpenGL ES 2.0 for rendering.
*   [Particle Park (⭐75)](https://github.com/raeleus/Particle-Park) - A showcase of downloadable particle effects with live previews.

### Resources / Others

*   [gdxGifRecorder (⭐39)](https://github.com/Anuken/GDXGifRecorder) - A utility class that records a GIF and saves it automatically.
*   [noise4j (⭐105)](https://github.com/czyzby/noise4j) - Simple map generators based on various procedural content generation tutorials.
items.content_html:
Resources / Algorithms and AI

  • gdx-ai (⭐1.3k) - Artificial Intelligence framework featuring Steering Behaviors, Formation Motion, Pathfinding, Behavior Trees and Finite State Machines.

Resources / Controllers

  • gdx-controllerutils (⭐60) - Adds Scene2D button input support, user configurable button mappings and hotplugging for LWJGL2.

Resources / Services

  • steamworks4j (⭐496) - A thin wrapper which allows Java applications to access the Steamworks C++ API.

Resources / User Interface

  • gdx-dialogs (⭐80) - Provides cross-platform support for native dialogs.
  • InGameConsole (⭐136) - Allows a developer to add a console (similar to how it is featured in Source games) to their game.

Resources / Visual Effects

  • Box2DLights (⭐262) - 2D lighting framework that uses Box2D for raycasting and OpenGL ES 2.0 for rendering.
  • Particle Park (⭐75) - A showcase of downloadable particle effects with live previews.

Resources / Others

  • gdxGifRecorder (⭐39) - A utility class that records a GIF and saves it automatically.
  • noise4j (⭐105) - Simple map generators based on various procedural content generation tutorials.
